Summary: Orb followed by triangular object descending in isolated rain in Las Vegas
divs: sighting detailsi live in las vegas and smoke cigaretts daily. i woke up in the middle of the night (4am to be exact) and went outside my apt to smoke as i do not smoke inside. on my porch, which is on the 2nd story, i noticed an interesting cloud formation with rain falling near the las vegas strip, which i can see from my apt in western las vegas, (on charleston bl.) i live within 10 miles of the strip. on that night, i photographed the interisting rain & cloud formations as we do not get much rain here. after reviewing the two photos i took, i found not only an orb which moved straight downward (yellow in color) but also noticed an unusual triangle of 3 green lights on the 2nd photograph both seemed to be "hiding" in the isolated rain shower. i have photographic proof time stamped 8\13\12 @ 4:40 & 4:41am. i am interested in knowing more of this particular sighting, where there any others this same morning? please advise prior to my going public on this event. seems they can hide, but not if you look close enough! mufon must contact me prior to photo release!
